subject: Follow up in regards to working with Simsonn
description_text:
This might be out of the blue, but can you sponsor my channel and make me a
Simsonn rep? Id love to test the upcoming base...

I have a Simagic Alpha... but Id love to try your base, if youd be
interested in working with my channel?
I currently have your Pedals and Vam Pro haptics already. But would like to
cover your products.

Please let me know and if you like, text me on +61422857863 and contact me
directly.

I have a good range of other products to compare yours to, to begin with.

Id at least like to discuss options with you and if nothing else, well id
like to provide input on things I can add also.

Kind Regards, Joseph Hughes - HDMC (Youtube Gregory Shtevensh)

conversations.body_text: Hi HDMC therapper,    Sorry, we couldn't find your channel. Please send us a link, and we will develop a suitable cooperation plan based on the circumstances.

Sure, here it is
https://youtube.com/@gregoryshtevensh?si=vKciXg2_nS5p1Q8E

On Sat, 2 Aug 2025, 12:51â€¯pm service@simsonn.com,
